name: Linux Gather System and User Information
author: Carlos Perez <carlos_perez@darkoperator.com>
Stephen Haywood <averagesecurityguy@gmail.com>
sinn3r <sinn3r@metasploit.com>
ohdae <bindshell@live.com>
Roberto Espreto <robertoespreto@gmail.com>
description:
This module gathers system information. We collect
        installed packages, installed services, mount information,
        user list, user bash history and cron jobs

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.
